home.intro: System Engineer with more than 5 years of experience in QA Automation, Manual QA, DevOps and Fullstack development. Specialized in test automation, testing framework development, CI/CD integration, advanced database management and web development with JavaScript, Python, Ruby on Rails and Java.

qa.title: QA Automation & Testing
qa.description: Extensive experience in test automation with Selenium WebDriver, automation framework development, CI/CD integration, API testing, and automated regression suite execution. More than 3 years in test automation.

javascript.title: JavaScript & Modern Frameworks
javascript.description: Expert in JavaScript (ES6+), TypeScript, Vue.js, React, Angular and Node.js. Fullstack development of modern web applications and REST APIs. Solid experience in frontend and backend development.

python.title: Python & ETL
python.description: Advanced knowledge in Python for test automation, ETL, data analysis and information processing. Experience with libraries like Airflow for task automation and data pipelines.

databases.title: Relational Databases
databases.description: More than 2 years of experience in advanced database management. Development of complex SQL queries, data modeling, optimization and management of relational databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQL Server, Oracle, PL/SQL).

devops.title: DevOps & CI/CD
devops.description: Experience in CI/CD pipeline configuration, Jenkins, GitLab CI, Docker, containerization, automated deployments and infrastructure as code. Integration of automated tests in continuous delivery pipelines.

railsJava.title: Ruby on Rails & Java
railsJava.description: REST API development with Ruby on Rails, routing, HTTP message handling and MVC architecture. Knowledge in Java for enterprise applications and desktop application development.

portfolio.intro: In training as a Web Development Technologist. Experience generating queries in SQL language, performing functional and non-functional software testing, quantitative information analysis and knowledge in Fullstack web development and hybrid mobile applications. With analytical capacity, proactivity, continuous improvement, service attitude and achievement orientation.
